content.raw:
I have a couple questions:

* how important is it that this be included in gazebo9 vs. the default branch (gazebo11)?
* the ABI change is from the added protected data member, which in a comment may not be necessary
* there are several changed function signatures in the API; if the existing functions are bad and need to go away, then at a minimum they should be deprecated and new ones added in parallel. If they can both co-exist, then just add new ones without deprecating.

it would also be nice to have some kind of test if possible, but I understand if that is not trivial

  • the ABI change is from the added protected data member, which in a comment may not be necessary
  • there are several changed function signatures in the API; if the existing functions are bad and need to go away, then at a minimum they should be deprecated and new ones added in parallel. If they can both co-exist, then just add new ones without deprecating.

it would also be nice to have some kind of test if possible, but I understand if that is not trivial
